lead_paragraph: Thirty-two-year-old Cameron Dye of Colorado captured the professional division of the 2016 event in 1 hour 48 minutes 31 seconds, and Sarah Haskins-Kortuem, 35, of Eureka, Mo., led the women.

headline.print_headline: The Long and Short of a Triathlon
headline.main: Boulder Man Wins New York City Triathlon

snippet: Thirty-two-year-old Cameron Dye of Colorado captured the professional division of the 2016 event in 1 hour 48 minutes 31 seconds, and Sarah Haskins-Kortuem, 35, of Eureka, Mo., led the women....
abstract: Photos of athletes competing in New York City Triathlon; Cameron Dye wins men's professional division in 1 hour 48 minutes and 31 seconds, while Sarah Haskins-Kortuem takes women's professional division in 1:57:59.
